Usability & Accessibility¶

The foci herein are the requirements/constraints vis-à-vis

  • Interface: The constraints herein depend on (a) the audience, e.g., children, young adults, executives, (b) the organisation's presentation or branding norms, (c) and more. [1]
  • Style: The audience, e.g., children, young adults, executives, dictates the constraints herein. [1]
  • Ease of use: Each ease of use constraint must have fit criteria for acceptance testing. [1]
  • Learnability: Again, each constraint must have fit criteria for acceptance testing. [1]
  • Accessibility; For more details study the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) [2]

The client team should have an unambiguous outline per requirement/constraint.



References
  1. Volere
  2. Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG)
